杬字的基本解释

杬
yuán
古书上说的一种乔木，树皮煎汁可贮藏和腌制水果、蛋类。
古同“芫”，芫花。

杬
wán
按摩。

杬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》愚袁切，平元，疑。］
(1)木名。生南方，皮厚，煎汁可用来腌制果品和禽蛋。
(2)同“芫”。草名。又名鱼毒。
[②]［wán］
犹按摩，推拿。

杬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杬； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页513第05
【唐韻】愚袁切【集韻】遇袁切，?音元。【玉篇】木名。【左思·吳都賦】綿杬杶櫨。【李善註】杬，大樹也，皮厚，味近苦澀，剝乾之，皮正赤，煎汁以藏衆果，使不敗壞，豫章有之。　又【爾雅·釋木】杬，魚毒。【註】本作杭。【郭疏】與李註同。《正字通》引《容齋隨筆》改入杬字，今從之。　又五患切，音玩。【史記·扁鵲傳】鑱石撟引，案杬毒熨。【索隱】杬謂按摩而玩弄身體使調也。　又【集韻】虞怨切，音願。椹也。　又【集韻】吾官切，音岏。義同。

杬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
杬字的起名意思

古书上说的一种乔木。古同“芫”，芫花。

杬
Basic explanation of words
杬
yuán
A kind of arbor mentioned in ancient books, the bark frying juice can store and pickle fruits and eggs.
In ancient times, the same "collard", the flower of coriander.
杬
wán
massage.
杬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guang Yun" Yu Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, doubt. ]
(1) Wooden name. Raw southern, thick skin, fried juice can be used to marinate fruits and eggs.
(2) Same as "芫". Cursive name. Also known as fish poison.
[②]［wán］
Still massage, massage.
杬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杬; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 513 05
【Tang Yun】Fool Yuanqie 【Jiyun】Meeting Yuanqie,? Phoneme. [Jade articles] Wooden names. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Mian Liao Liao Liao. [Li Shan's Note] Ye, a big tree, thick skin, almost bitter taste, peeled dry, the skin is red, decoction to store the fruits, so that it is not spoiled, Yuzhang has it.　[Erya·Shimu], fish poison. [Note] This is Hang. [Guo Shu] Same with Li Note. "Zhengzitong" quoted "Rongzhai's Essays" and changed it into the character 杬, and now follow it.　Five more troubles, sound play. [Historical Records · Biography of Bian Que] Rong Shi Qiao cited, the case was ironed with poison. 【Suoyin】It is called massage and playing with the body to make adjustments.　[Jiyun] The grievances are cut, and the voice wishes.椹 also.　[Jiyun] I cut the official, the sound is dizzy. The same meaning.
杬

杬
Name meaning
A kind of arbor mentioned in ancient books. In ancient times, the same "collard", the flower of coriander.
yuán, wàn
I yuán сущ.
юань (дерево, род каштана с толстой корою, горький красный сок которого предохраняет от порчи плоды)
